mewa itha wadagath mathaka satahan wiya. 1840 di ohu wisin idiripath kala pospeta ha aasaneta nam wu lipiya rajakiya sangamaya wisin prathikshepa karana lada athara ehi prathipala durwala wu nisa eya prakashayata awasara nodena ladi.namuth pasuwa ohu wisinma eya prakashana hatharakin yukthawa prakashayata path karana lada athara (eya amla padanamath, bhashma padanamath ha lawana padanamath thula ha lawanawala wiwidhathwayan mathada pahadana ladi)
